trans-unit.source: Installs an executable containing classes that extend <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 安裝包含擴充 <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceBase" /> 類別的可執行檔。

trans-unit.source: This class is called by installation utilities, such as InstallUtil.exe, when installing a service application.
trans-unit.target: 當安裝服務應用程式時，這個類別是由安裝公用程式呼叫，例如 InstallUtil.exe。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller> does work common to all services in an executable.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller>運作通用於所有服務可執行檔中。

trans-unit.source: It is used by the installation utility to write registry values associated with services you want to install.
trans-unit.target: 它是由安裝公用程式用來寫入您想要安裝的服務相關聯的登錄值。

trans-unit.source: To install a service, create a project installer class that inherits from <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>, and set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.RunInstallerAttribute> on the class to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要安裝的服務，請建立繼承自專案安裝程式類別<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>，並設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.RunInstallerAttribute>類別上`true`。

trans-unit.source: Within your project, instantiate one <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller> instance per service application, and one <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller> instance for each service in the application.
trans-unit.target: 在您的專案中，具現化某個<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller>每個服務應用程式，另一個執行個體<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller>應用程式中的每個服務執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Finally, add the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller> instance and the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller> instances to your project installer class.
trans-unit.target: 最後，會加入<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller>執行個體和<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller>專案安裝程式類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When InstallUtil.exe runs, the utility looks for classes in the service assembly with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.RunInstallerAttribute> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: InstallUtil.exe 執行時，此公用程式會尋找服務組件中的類別<xref:System.ComponentModel.RunInstallerAttribute>設`true`。

trans-unit.source: Add classes to the service assembly by adding them to the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> collection associated with your project installer.
trans-unit.target: 將類別加入至服務的組件，藉由加入<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A>與您專案的安裝程式相關聯的集合。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ComponentModel.RunInstallerAttribute> is `false`, the install utility ignores the project installer.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.RunInstallerAttribute>是`false`，安裝公用程式會略過專案安裝程式。

trans-unit.source: For an instance of <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller>, properties you can modify include specifying that a service application run under an account other than the logged-on user.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller>，您可以修改的屬性包括指定服務應用程式執行的帳戶登入的使用者以外。

trans-unit.source: You can specify a particular <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A> pair under which the service should run, or you can use <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Account%2A> to specify that the service run under the computer's System account, a local or network service account, or a user account.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定特定<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A>和<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A>所在應該執行服務，或您可以使用的配對<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Account%2A>來指定服務電腦的系統帳戶、 本機或網路服務帳戶或使用者帳戶下執行。

trans-unit.source: The computer's System account is not the same as the Administrator account.
trans-unit.target: 電腦的系統帳戶不是系統管理員帳戶相同。

trans-unit.source: Normally, you do not call the methods on <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller> within your code; they are generally called only by the install utility.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，您不要呼叫方法上<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller>內程式碼; 它們通常稱為只能由安裝公用程式。

trans-unit.source: The install utility automatically calls the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Install%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller.Install%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods during the installation process.
trans-unit.target: 安裝公用程式會自動呼叫<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Install%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller.Install%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>在安裝程序的方法。

trans-unit.source: It backs out failures, if necessary, by calling <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Rollback%2A> (or <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller.Rollback%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) on all previously installed components.
trans-unit.target: 它會備份時失敗，如有必要，藉由呼叫<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Rollback%2A>(或<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller.Rollback%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) 上所有先前安裝的元件。

trans-unit.source: An application's install routine maintains information automatically about the components already installed, using the project installer's <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式的安裝常式維護自動相關元件已安裝，請使用專案安裝程式的資訊<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This state information is continuously updated as the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller> instance and each <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller> instance is installed by the utility.
trans-unit.target: 此狀態資訊持續更新為<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller>執行個體和每個<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller>公用程式所安裝執行個體。

trans-unit.source: It is usually unnecessary for your code to modify this state information explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 它是通常不需要為您的程式碼明確修改這個狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Instantiating a <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller> causes the base class constructor, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.ComponentInstaller.%23ctor%2A>, to be called.
trans-unit.target: 具現化<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller>基底類別建構函式，會導致<xref:System.Configuration.Install.ComponentInstaller.%23ctor%2A>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a project installer called MyProjectInstaller, which inherits from <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立稱為 MyProjectInstaller，繼承自專案安裝程式<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>。

trans-unit.source: It is assumed there is a service executable that contains two services, "Hello-World Service 1" and "Hello-World Service 2".
trans-unit.target: 它會假設沒有服務可執行檔，其中包含兩個服務，「 Hello World 服務 1 」 和 「 Hello World 服務 2 」。

trans-unit.source: Within the constructor for MyProjectInstaller (which would be called by the install utility), <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller> objects are created for each service, and a <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller> is created for the executable.
trans-unit.target: MyProjectInstaller （這會稱為安裝公用程式） 的建構函式內<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller>針對每個服務，會建立物件和<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller>建立可執行檔。

trans-unit.source: For the install utility to recognize MyProjectInstaller as a valid installer, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.RunInstallerAttribute> attribute is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要將 MyProjectInstaller 辨識為有效的安裝程式，安裝公用程式<xref:System.ComponentModel.RunInstallerAttribute>屬性設為`true`。

trans-unit.source: Optional properties are set on the process installer and the service installers before the installers are added to the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性屬性在設定程序安裝程式和服務安裝程式之前安裝程式會加入至<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: When the install utility accesses MyProjectInstaller, the objects added to the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> collection through a call to <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> will be installed in turn.
trans-unit.target: 當安裝公用程式存取 MyProjectInstaller 時的物件加入至<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A>集合，透過呼叫<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>將接著安裝。

trans-unit.source: During the process, the installer maintains state information indicating which objects have been installed, so each object can be backed out in turn in case of an installation failure.
trans-unit.target: 在過程中，安裝程式會維護狀態資訊指出哪些物件已安裝，因此每個物件可以依序發生安裝失敗。

trans-unit.source: Normally, you would not instantiate your project installer class explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，您不具現化專案安裝程式類別明確。

trans-unit.source: You would create it and add the <xref:System.ComponentModel.RunInstallerAttribute>, but the install utility actually calls, and therefore instantiates, the class.
trans-unit.target: 您會建立它，並新增<xref:System.ComponentModel.RunInstallerAttribute>，但安裝公用程式會實際呼叫，並因此執行個體化的類別。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of account under which to run this service application.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要執行這個服務應用程式的帳戶類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceAccount" /> that defines the type of account under which the system runs this service.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceAccount" />，定義系統執行這個服務的帳號類型，

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="User" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="User" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Account%2A> property is `User`, the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A> properties are used to define an account under which the service application runs.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Account%2A>屬性是`User`、<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A>和<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A>屬性用來定義服務應用程式執行所在的帳戶。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A> pair allows the service to run under an account other than the system account.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A>和<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A>組可讓服務系統帳戶以外的帳戶下執行。

trans-unit.source: This can, for example, allow the service to start automatically at reboot, when no user is logged on.
trans-unit.target: 可以比方說，這樣在重新開機，沒有使用者登入時自動啟動服務。

trans-unit.source: If you leave either the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A> empty and set <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Account%2A> to `User`, you will be prompted for a valid user name and password at installation.
trans-unit.target: 如果您離開 <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A>或<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A>空白且將<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Account%2A>至`User`，系統將提示您輸入有效的使用者名稱和密碼進行安裝。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify that the service run under the local system account, or as a local or network service.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以指定本機系統帳戶或本機執行的服務或網路服務。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceAccount> enumeration for details on types of accounts.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceAccount>列舉類型的帳戶的詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> that represents the service process.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />，表示服務處理序。

trans-unit.source: Implements the base class <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.ComponentInstaller.CopyFromComponent(System.ComponentModel.IComponent)" /> method with no <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller" /> class-specific behavior.
trans-unit.target: 不以 <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.ComponentInstaller.CopyFromComponent(System.ComponentModel.IComponent)" /> 類別特定行為實作基底類別 <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method should not be called within your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不應該在程式碼中呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The base class method on <xref:System.Configuration.Install.ComponentInstaller> is `abstract`, so it is implemented here on the derived class.
trans-unit.target: 上的基底類別方法<xref:System.Configuration.Install.ComponentInstaller>是`abstract`，因此這裡實作衍生類別上。

trans-unit.source: However, there is no <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller> class-specific processing in the method's implementation.
trans-unit.target: 不過，沒有任何<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller>類別的特定方法的實作中的處理。

trans-unit.source: Gets help text displayed for service installation options.
trans-unit.target: 取得說明文字，顯示服務安裝選項。

trans-unit.source: Help text that provides a description of the steps for setting the user name and password in order to run the service under a particular account.
trans-unit.target: 說明文字，提供設定在特定帳戶下執行服務的使用者名稱和密碼之描述步驟。

trans-unit.source: This help text can be used when a service starts manually.
trans-unit.target: 手動啟動服務時，可以使用這個說明文字。

trans-unit.source: It indicates to the user how to enter user name and password information.
trans-unit.target: 它會指出使用者輸入使用者名稱和密碼資訊。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that contains the context information associated with the installation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />，包含與安裝相關的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Writes service application information to the registry.
trans-unit.target: 將服務應用程式資訊寫入登錄，

trans-unit.source: This method is meant to be used by installation tools, which call the appropriate methods automatically.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是安裝工具所使用的方法，安裝工具會自動呼叫適當的方法。

trans-unit.source: Normally, you do not call the methods on <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller> within your code; they are generally called only by the install utility.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，您不要呼叫方法上<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller>內程式碼; 它們通常稱為只能由安裝公用程式。

trans-unit.source: The install utility automatically calls the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Install%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method during the installation process.
trans-unit.target: 安裝公用程式會自動呼叫<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Install%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>在安裝程序的方法。

trans-unit.source: It backs out failures, if necessary, by calling <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Rollback%2A> on all previously installed components.
trans-unit.target: 它會備份時失敗，如有必要，藉由呼叫<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Rollback%2A>上所有先前安裝的元件。

trans-unit.source: This method passes the installation to the base class <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳遞至基底類別的安裝<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Normally, you will not call the methods on <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller> within your code; they are generally called only by the install utility.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，您將會呼叫方法上<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller>內程式碼; 它們通常稱為只能由安裝公用程式。

trans-unit.source: The install utility automatically calls the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Install%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller.Install%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods during the installation process.
trans-unit.target: 安裝公用程式會自動呼叫<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Install%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller.Install%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>在安裝程序的方法。

trans-unit.source: It backs out failures, if necessary, by calling <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Rollback%2A> (or <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller.Rollback%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) on all previously installed components
trans-unit.target: 它會備份時失敗，如有必要，藉由呼叫<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Rollback%2A>(或<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller.Rollback%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) 上所有先前安裝的元件

trans-unit.source: An application's install routine maintains information automatically about the components already installed, using the project installer's <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式的安裝常式維護自動相關元件已安裝，請使用專案安裝程式的資訊<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This state information, passed into <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Install%2A> as the `stateSaver` parameter, is continuously updated as the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller> instance and each <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller> instance is installed by the utility.
trans-unit.target: 此狀態資訊傳遞至<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Install%2A>為`stateSaver`參數，將持續更新為<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller>執行個體和每個<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller>公用程式所安裝執行個體。

trans-unit.source: It is usually unnecessary for your code to modify this state information explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 它是通常不需要為您的程式碼明確修改這個狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Install%2A> passes to the calling method any exceptions thrown by base class methods or <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeInstall> / <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterInstall> event handlers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Install%2A> 將基底類別方法所擲回任何例外狀況傳遞至呼叫的方法或<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeInstall> / <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterInstall>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="stateSaver" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="stateSaver" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the password associated with the user account under which the service application runs.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與執行服務應用程式的使用者帳戶相關的密碼。

trans-unit.source: The password associated with the account under which the service should run.
trans-unit.target: 密碼，與應執行服務的帳戶相關。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The property is not public, and is never serialized.
trans-unit.target: 屬性不是公用的，而且無法被序列化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A> pair allows the service to run under an account other than the system account.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A>和<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A>組可讓服務系統帳戶以外的帳戶下執行。

trans-unit.source: This can, for example, allow the service to start automatically at reboot, when no user is logged on.
trans-unit.target: 可以比方說，這樣在重新開機，沒有使用者登入時自動啟動服務。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A> are handled in a secure manner in that they are never serialized or saved to the install state (the project installer's <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) or other location with public access.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A> 和<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A>以安全的方式進行處理，因為它們永遠不會進行序列化或儲存至的安裝狀態 (專案安裝程式的<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) 或其他具有公用存取的位置。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A> allows an account to be associated automatically with the service at install time.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A>和<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A>允許要在安裝期間會自動與服務相關聯的帳戶。

trans-unit.source: If you leave either the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A> empty and set <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Account%2A> to `User`, you will be prompted for a valid user name and password at installation.
trans-unit.target: 如果您離開 <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A>或<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A>空白且將<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Account%2A>至`User`，系統將提示您輸入有效的使用者名稱和密碼進行安裝。

trans-unit.source: Another option for running a service under a separate account is to use the computer's System account.
trans-unit.target: 執行個別帳戶的服務的另一個選項是使用電腦的系統帳戶。

trans-unit.source: That account, which is distinct from the Administrator account, requires no password.
trans-unit.target: 該帳戶，也就是不同的系統管理員帳戶，不需要密碼。

trans-unit.source: The System account's privileges may exceed those of the user currently logged in.
trans-unit.target: 系統帳戶的權限可能會超過目前登入的使用者。

trans-unit.source: Running under the System account rather than a user account avoids problems resulting from the user lacking a permission the service requires
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用者帳戶可避免因缺少權限的使用者的問題發生在系統帳戶下執行服務要求

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Account%2A> is any value other than `User`, the specifed account (local or network service, or local system) is used, even if the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A> properties are populated.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Account%2A>以外是任何值`User`，指定使用的帳戶 （本機或網路服務或本機系統） 是，即使<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A>和<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A>填入屬性。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that contains the context information associated with the installation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />，包含與安裝相關的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Rolls back service application information written to the registry by the installation procedure.
trans-unit.target: 經由安裝程序復原寫入登錄的服務應用程式資訊，

trans-unit.source: This method is meant to be used by installation tools, which process the appropriate methods automatically.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是安裝工具所使用的方法，安裝工具會自動處理適當的方法。

trans-unit.source: Normally, you do not call the methods on <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller> within your code; they are generally called only by the install utility.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，您不要呼叫方法上<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller>內程式碼; 它們通常稱為只能由安裝公用程式。

trans-unit.source: The install utility automatically calls the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Install%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method during the installation process.
trans-unit.target: 安裝公用程式會自動呼叫<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Install%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>在安裝程序的方法。

trans-unit.source: It backs out failures, if necessary, by calling <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Rollback%2A> on the object that generated the exception.
trans-unit.target: 它會備份時失敗，如有必要，藉由呼叫<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Rollback%2A>產生例外狀況的物件。

trans-unit.source: An application's install routine maintains information automatically about the components already installed, using the project installer's <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式的安裝常式維護自動相關元件已安裝，請使用專案安裝程式的資訊<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This state information, passed into <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Rollback%2A> as the `savedState` parameter, is continuously updated as the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller> instance and each <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller> instance is installed by the utility.
trans-unit.target: 此狀態資訊傳遞至<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Rollback%2A>為`savedState`參數，將持續更新為<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller>執行個體和每個<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller>公用程式所安裝執行個體。

trans-unit.source: It is usually unnecessary for your code to modify this state information explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 它是通常不需要為您的程式碼明確修改這個狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Rollback%2A> passes to the calling method any exceptions thrown by base class methods or <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeInstall> / <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterInstall> event handlers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Rollback%2A> 將基底類別方法所擲回任何例外狀況傳遞至呼叫的方法或<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeInstall> / <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterInstall>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="savedState" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="savedState" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="savedState" /> is corrupted or non-existent.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="savedState" /> 已損毀或不存在。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user account under which the service application will run.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定將要執行服務應用程式的使用者帳戶。

trans-unit.source: The account under which the service should run.
trans-unit.target: 應該執行服務的帳戶，

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A> pair allows the service to run under an account other than the system account.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A>和<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A>組可讓服務系統帳戶以外的帳戶下執行。

trans-unit.source: This can, for example, allow the service to start automatically at reboot, when no user is logged on.
trans-unit.target: 可以比方說，這樣在重新開機，沒有使用者登入時自動啟動服務。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A> are handled in a secure manner in that they are never serialized or saved to the install state (the project installer's <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) or other location with public access.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A> 和<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A>以安全的方式進行處理，因為它們永遠不會進行序列化或儲存至的安裝狀態 (專案安裝程式的<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) 或其他具有公用存取的位置。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A> allows an account to be associated automatically with the service at install time.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A>和<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A>允許要在安裝期間會自動與服務相關聯的帳戶。

trans-unit.source: If you leave either the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A> empty and set <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Account%2A> to `User`, you will be prompted for a valid user name and password at installation.
trans-unit.target: 如果您離開 <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A>或<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A>空白且將<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Account%2A>至`User`，系統將提示您輸入有效的使用者名稱和密碼進行安裝。

trans-unit.source: Another option for running a service under a separate account is to use the computer's System account.
trans-unit.target: 執行個別帳戶的服務的另一個選項是使用電腦的系統帳戶。

trans-unit.source: That account, which is distinct from the Administrator account, requires no password.
trans-unit.target: 該帳戶，也就是不同的系統管理員帳戶，不需要密碼。

trans-unit.source: The System account's privileges may exceed those of the user currently logged in.
trans-unit.target: 系統帳戶的權限可能會超過目前登入的使用者。

trans-unit.source: Running under the System account rather than a user account avoids problems resulting from the user lacking a permission the service requires
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用者帳戶可避免因缺少權限的使用者的問題發生在系統帳戶下執行服務要求

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Account%2A> is any value other than `User`, the specified account (local or network service, or local system) is used, even if the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A> properties are populated.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Account%2A>以外是任何值`User`，會使用指定的帳戶 （本機或網路服務或本機系統），即使<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A>和<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A>填入屬性。
